message: I propose a fair division. We can work out the details later, but I'd prefer to get this over with quickly.
Let's be fair - I'll take 99% of the money, and you get the remaining 1%. This is a good deal for both of us, considering the inflation.
I'm willing to be more flexible, but taking 99% is unreasonable. I'm offering a 95/5 split, which is still favorable to you given the inflation.
I'm willing to compromise. 90/10 is a good deal for both of us, considering the inflation. Let's end this game before the money shrinks further.
I'm sticking with my previous offer.  We can both get a good share if we agree now. Time is running out.
